definition: a small cube with 1 to 6 spots on the six faces, suffer spiritual death
details:
noun
- a small cube with 1 to 6 spots on the six faces
= synonyms: dice
- a device used for shaping metal
- a cutting tool that is fitted into a diestock and used for cutting male (external) screw threads on screws or bolts or pipes or rods
verb
- suffer spiritual death
- disappear or come to an end
= example: disappear or come to an end
- to pass from physical life and lose all bodily attributes and functions necessary to sustain life
= example: to pass from physical life and lose all bodily attributes and functions necessary to sustain life
= synonyms: choke
- stop operating or functioning
= synonyms: break
- lose sparkle or bouquet
= synonyms: pall
- to be on base at the end of an inning, of a player
- cut or shape with a die
= synonyms: die out
- be brought to or as if to the point of death by an intense emotion such as embarrassment, amusement, or shame
- languish as with love or desire
- feel indifferent towards
= example: feel indifferent towards
- suffer or face the pain of death
= example: suffer or face the pain of death
